01 Dec 2017

Mini Fruit Cake (Orange)

Cute and easy to eat, perfect with tea!

Ingredients:

  • low gluten flour 60 grams
  • butter 60 grams
  • 40 grams of fine sugar
  • whole egg 60 grams
  • milk (or water) 15 grams
  • baking powder 2 grams
  • candied orange peel 30 grams.

Cooking Steps

  1. To make this cake, we can use many different types of dried fruits (dried cranberries, raisins, etc.). In this recipe, we will use candied orange peel.

  2. Place a whole egg into the cup of Westinghouse machine, then add sugar, candied orange peel, and milk.

  3. Select the program of fruits and vegetables and set time to 2 minutes.

  4. Pour the liquid out.

  5. Sieve the low-gluten flour and baking powder mixed into the orange peel liquid.

  6. Stir with a scraper until it forms a thin paste.

  7. Cut the butter into small pieces and heat it in a microwave until it becomes a liquid. Pour the liquid butter into the batter. Make sure the butter is not hot enough to cook the mixture.

  8. Mix again and the cake batter is done.

  9. Pour batter into the cupcake mold

  10. Place the mold into the preheated oven at 190 â„ƒ. Bake for 12 minutes until the cake completely expanded and the surface is golden.
